item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Merchant does not authorize the product for broker It’s a common problem that affect brokers trying to quote or sell products that they are not authorized for. To solve the problem, the broker needs to verify his credentials with the insurer, and check if the product or plans are in active state. Payment method not available for this installment The payment method that you are trying the use from installment is not in the list of available ones.
